Row.Text: Killing an enemy unit has earned {1_Num} points towards a Great Person in {2_Str}.
Contract Complete!
Your Great Person, {1_Str}, has made her wish! She made a contract and became a Magical Girl!
Your Great Person has made her wish! She made a contract and became a Magical Girl!
Because of your flourishing Golden Age, a new Resource has automatically spread to one of your City's workable tiles!
Resource Spread!
You gain {1_Num} Points towards a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age from Resources owned by Civilizations to whom you have Trade Routes.
[ICON_FOOD] Stolen Food

Amount of [ICON_FOOD] Food carried by the {1_Str} which has been stolen from enemy Civilizations through pillaging Improvements or sacking Trade Routes. It can either be brought to a City to use directly as [ICON_FOOD] Food, or used by the Unit itself to instantly heal it, at a rate of 2 Food per 1 HP.
[ICON_CULTURE] Harmony

Amount of [ICON_CULTURE] Harmony earned by the {1_Str} from earning Experience Levels. Units with Harmony garrisoned in a City will lose 1 Harmony point in exchange for boosting that City's [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output from Great Works by 100% for that turn.
[COLOR:190:170:211:255]Stop Time[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR:190:170:211:255]Stop Time[ENDCOLOR] ({1_Num})

Temporarily freeze time for all other Civilizations. During stopped time, other Civilizations have the effects of Anarchy (no [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_GOLD], [ICON_CULTURE], or [ICON_PEACE]), and all of their units will be unable to take any action. However, some actions may still be taken, such as diplomatic trades and City Ranged attacks (at reduced range), and Cities will still grow. This lasts for a single turn, and, after its use, cannot be used again for another 30 turns.

Temporarily freeze time for all other Civilizations. During stopped time, other Civilizations have the effects of Anarchy (no [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_GOLD], [ICON_CULTURE], or [ICON_PEACE]), and all of their units will be unable to take any action. However, some actions may still be taken, such as diplomatic trades and City Ranged attacks (at reduced range), and Cities will still grow. This lasts for a single turn, and, after its use, cannot be used again for another 35 turns.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]This ability may not be used again for [ENDCOLOR]{1_Num}[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT] turns.[ENDCOLOR]

Temporarily freeze time for all other Civilizations. During stopped time, other Civilizations have the effects of Anarchy (no [ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_GOLD], [ICON_CULTURE], or [ICON_PEACE]), and all of their units will be unable to take any action. However, some actions may still be taken, such as diplomatic trades and City Ranged attacks (at reduced range), and Cities will still grow. This lasts for a single turn, and, after its use, cannot be used again for another 35 turns.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]This effect is already active.[ENDCOLOR]
The world around you slows to a stop! Make the best of this opportunity!
The magical sands within your shield have fully passed into one end of the hourglass. You may freeze time again!
The passage of time resumes again as normal.
Your {1_Str} stole the necessary tools from the captured City to earn the {2_Str} Promotion!
Your {1_Str} stole {2_Num} [ICON_FOOD] Food from the {3_Str}!
The area pillaged by your {1_Str} was pillaged too recently, and there was not enough food worth stealing.

An enemy Civilization has managed to stop the passage of time for everyone but themselves! During frozen time, your Civilization will be in a state of [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Anarchy[ENDCOLOR] and none of your units will be able to take action!
Time Stopped!
Your {1_Str} distributed {3_Num} [ICON_FOOD] Food to the City of {2_Str}.
Your {1_Str} healed itself for {2_Num} HP by eating its Stolen Food.
Your {1_Str} stole {2_Num} [ICON_FOOD] Food when it sacked the Trade Route!
You killed the Witch and recovered a [ICON_PMMM_GRIEF_SEED] Grief Seed from it!
You killed the Witch and crushed its [ICON_PMMM_GRIEF_SEED] Grief Seed, absorbing its energy into your Dark Orb and earning {1_Num} points towards a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.
{1_Str} used a [ICON_PMMM_GRIEF_SEED] Grief Seed, recovering {2_Num}% of her Soul Gem's glow.

You currently have [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Num}[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_PMMM_GRIEF_SEED] Grief Seeds.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grief Seeds are used to cleanse the Soul Gems of your Magical Girls and are earned by killing Witches. Each Grief Seed will restore [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_Num}%[ENDCOLOR] of a Magical Girl's Soul Gem luster.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]To use a Grief Seed, click on the Soul Gem Percentage of the Magical Girl's unit information panel when you have her selected.
Despite her best efforts, {1_Str} finally gave in to her despair and became a Witch. As tough as it may be to do, you must kill her, as she is now a threat to humanity.
Your Magical Girl became a Witch!

{1_Str} came incredibly close to having her Soul Gem shatter, but her nearly limitless resolve gave her the strength to push through until one of her companions gave her an emergency Grief Seed. The experience was very taxing on both her body and her soul, and thus she will be out of commission for a while.
Your Leader Magical Girl had to be hospitalized!

{1_Str} was nearly killed in combat, but managed to escape at the last possible moment. She is now in the care of your country's best medical practitioners and is in critical condition. She will return to the battlefield as soon as possible.
Your Leader Magical Girl had to be hospitalized!
[ICON_PMMM_SOUL_GEM] Soul Gem:

Represents how clean this Magical Girl's [ICON_PMMM_SOUL_GEM] Soul Gem is. It is currently in [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Str}[ENDCOLOR] Condition.[NEWLINE]Click this button to use a [ICON_PMMM_GRIEF_SEED] Grief Seed to recover [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_Num}%[ENDCOLOR] of its luster.

Represents how clean this Magical Girl's [ICON_PMMM_SOUL_GEM] Soul Gem is. It is currently in [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]{1_Str}[ENDCOLOR] Condition.[NEWLINE]Click this button to use a [ICON_PMMM_GRIEF_SEED] Grief Seed to recover [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_Num}%[ENDCOLOR] of its luster.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]WARNING![ENDCOLOR] At this stage of Corruption, your Magical Girl is prone to becoming a Witch at any time! Do everything you can to secure a Grief Seed before it is too late!

Set.Text: You have destroyed the Witch's Labyrinth, granting the Unit which performed the task a boost of {1_Num} XP!
You have destroyed a Witch's Labyrinth!

Row.Text: You have subjugated a Magical Girl, removed her powers, and wiped all of her memories of ever making a contract. She will now live her life normally, and will never need intervention from Madoka. You have taken some of her power for yourself, increasing your [ICON_CAPITAL] Palace's yields.
Magical Girl Subjugated!

Your Herald brought a much-needed ray of sunshine into {1_Str}'s life, and she gladly accepted the offer to be led away. After {2_Num} turns, she will have recovered from her despair and will fight for your cause to bring salvation to the rest of the world's Magical Girls.
Led an enemy Magical Girl away through the Law of Cycles!

{1_Str} was nearly overcome by her despair. Fortunately, you were there to take away her suffering and lead her back to your realm. After {2_Num} turns, she will have recovered from her despair and will rise once again to fight for the salvation of the world's Magical Girls, though the experience will cause her to lose all of her earned Promotions.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Magical Girl led away by the Law of Cycles![ENDCOLOR]

A supposed "Herald of Madoka" spread lies about a nebulous goddess to {1_Str}. In her despair, she took the words at face value and defected to their side! After some time, you may end up fighting {1_Str} yourself! Be prepared.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Your Magical Girl was taken away![ENDCOLOR]
{1_Str} has been reborn via the Law of Cycles, and stands ready to fight again!
Magical Girl Reborn!
Your unit's commanding presence caused all of the Familiars near the destroyed Witch's Labyrinth to bow down to your control!
Familiars Dominated!
You attempted to capture the enemy Magical Girl, but she resisted too much and had to be killed.
{1_Str}'s Witch was killed in combat, causing her to take heavy damage -- both physically and mentally!
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+{1_Num}% [ICON_PMMM_SOUL_GEM][ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]-{1_Num}% [ICON_PMMM_SOUL_GEM][ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR:146:217:213:255]+({1_Num})% [ICON_PMMM_SOUL_GEM][ENDCOLOR]
Witch Evolution!

After being preyed upon for thousands of years by Magical Girls and the armies of their nations' leaders, Witches have begun to evolve, developing a new means of defense. They will now hide most of their new Barriers from sight, near Cities. They have also developed the Witch's Kiss, a hypnotizing seal which will lure unsuspecting victims into the Barrier without the Witch having to leave it. It is now up to your Magical Girls to hunt down these Hidden Witch Labyrinths and draw out the Witches within them.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Note: Witch's Labyrinths will not spawn in the territories of Civilizations which do not earn Magical Girls or whose Magical Girls do not become Witches, such as Madoka's Realm or Homura's Realm.)
Hidden Witch Rumors in {1_Str}

A rash of suicides has been reported in the City of {1_Str}. This is symptomatic of a Hidden Witch setting up its Barrier near the City to lure its citizens to their doom. Use one of your Magical Girls to begin tracking down the Witch so that you may force it out of hiding![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As long as the Witch remains Hidden, the City will lose [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]{2_Str}%[ENDCOLOR] of the amount of [ICON_FOOD] Food required to reach the next Population every turn. This can cause [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens to die!
Hidden Witch Rumors from {1_Str}

The City-State of {1_Str} has reported that its citizens are committing suicide en masse. This is symptomatic of a Hidden Witch setting up its Barrier near the City-State to lure its citizens to their doom. Use one of your Magical Girls to begin tracking down the Witch so that you may force it out of hiding! Not only can this earn you a [ICON_PMMM_GRIEF_SEED] Grief Seed, but the populace of {1_Str} will be quite grateful if you take care of this issue!
Hidden Witch Drawn Out!
{1_Str} successfully drew a Witch out of hiding! Destroy the Witch and its Familiars!
Hidden Witch Not Found

{1_Str} was not able to locate the Hidden Witch Labyrinth.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The response from her Soul Gem is [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Strong[ENDCOLOR], indicating that the Barrier must only be one or two tiles away at the most.
Hidden Witch Not Found

{1_Str} was not able to locate the Hidden Witch Labyrinth.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The response from her Soul Gem is [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Weak[ENDCOLOR], indicating that the Barrier is at least two more tiles away.
Hidden Witch Labyrinth Discovered!
{1_Str} used the divination with which you have empowered her to locate a Hidden Witch Labyrinth's exact location!
Captured a Magical Girl and Placed Her in the Freezer!

You captured {1_Str}, an enemy Magical Girl, and brought her to your Capital to be placed in the cryogenic storage of your Freezer. From there, you can try to revive her to either fight by your side, or possibly even free her from the shackles of being a Magical Girl forever...
Your experiment with {1_Str} was a complete disaster! She has turned into a Witch and is attacking your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital!
Your experiment with {1_Str} was a failure. Her Soul Gem has shattered.
Your experiment with {1_Str} was a failure and she is now dead, but you have gleaned valuable information from the experiment. You'll do better next time.
Your experiment with {1_Str} was a success! After explaining your reasons and hearing her initial loud complaints about your capturing of her, she has decided to fight by your side.
Your experiment with {1_Str} was a resounding success! The contract has been reversed, her memories of being a Magical Girl are erased, and she can now live a normal life. Your people are ecstatic!
While in your Freezer, {1_Str} turned into a Witch and escaped!
You have managed to release the Magical Girl, {1_Str}, from the confines of the Freezer! She has joined your side in gratitude!
A Magical Girl kept in the captured city's Freezer, {1_Str}, turned into a Witch as soon as you began raiding the building!
A Hidden Witch has lured some of the population of {1_Str} to their deaths, causing a loss of {2_Num} [ICON_FOOD] Food in the City.
A [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen of the City of {1_Str} has been killed due to the Hidden Witch!
{1_Name}'s [ICON_PMMM_SOUL_GEM] Soul Gem is at a Critical level! If you do not give her a [ICON_PMMM_GRIEF_SEED] Grief Seed as soon as possible, she may turn into a Witch!

{1_Name}'s [ICON_PMMM_SOUL_GEM] Soul Gem is at a Critical level! If you do not give her a [ICON_PMMM_GRIEF_SEED] Grief Seed as soon as possible, you will need to lead her away via the Law of Cycles -- which, while it is not a cruel fate like becoming a Witch, will nonetheless be quite taxing on her and will take her out of commission for a while and weaken her!
{1_Name} is in Critical Condition!
The Familiar killed and ate the populace of the area it pillaged, giving it enough strength to become a fully-grown Witch!
{1_Name} has developed the following Like/Dislike:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{2_String}
This Like/Dislike was influenced by her conversations with other Magical Girls.
{1_Name} has Developed a new Like/Dislike
{1_Name}'s conversations with other Magical Girls have changed her outlook on certain issues.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{2_OldLD}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]was changed to:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{3_NewLD}
{1_Name}'s Likes/Dislikes have Changed
{1_Name} had a nice conversation with {2_Name}, improving the Mood of both girls.
The {1_CivAdjective} Magical Girl, {2_Name}, had a conversation with {3_Name}, improving the Mood of both girls.
The Truth was revealed to one of your Magical Girls!
A fiendish Incubator revealed to {1_Name} the proof that some of the Magical Girls born to your Civilization met the fate of turning into Witches, causing her to spiral into psychosis!
The Witch transformation of the Magical Girl {1_Name} has revealed the horrible truth of the Magical Girl system to {2_Name}! Her Mood will now suffer a monumental penalty!
Magical Girl Emotionally Manipulated by an Incubator

{1_Name} was emotionally abused by an Incubator -- made aware of her shortcomings, convincing her she will never be able to protect those dear to her, and other nasty statements delivered in that emotionless, matter-of-fact tone. Her Mood has lowered as a result, though she at least took out her anger on the Incubator and tore it to pieces.
(The damage dealt by the enemy unit was automatically healed.)
your own country
After you gave her leave, {1_MGName} decided to take a vacation in [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_CivilizationName}[ENDCOLOR]. She has already departed, and will be back in {3_Turns} turns.
Magical Girl Went on Vacation
{1_MGName} has returned from her Vacation in {2_CivilizationName}. The experience has heightened her [ICON_PMMM_MOOD] Mood by [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{3_Mood}[ENDCOLOR]!
Magical Girl Returned from Vacation
...she says something feels odd, though. She seems to have forgotten how to use the ability "[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]{1_Promotion}[ENDCOLOR]!" Was it something that the enemy country did to her?
Foreign Magical Girl Vacationing in your Empire

The {2_Adjective} Magical Girl, {1_Name}, has decided to take a Vacation in your Empire. Ensure she has a good time via a high amount of [ICON_PMMM_ENTERTAINMENT] Entertainment, and she may eventually decide that the grass is greener here...
Foreign Magical Girl Ended her Vacation

The Magical Girl {1_Name} has returned to her home country, {2_Civilization}. Her [ICON_PMMM_MOOD] Mood was increased by {3_Num} due to your Empire's [ICON_PMMM_ENTERTAINMENT] Entertainment. It should leave an impression of the glory of your Empire on her.

While she was there, you made sure to subtly siphon some of her magical power, and she seems to be none the wiser for it. This has granted your Palace half of the power it would gain from subjugating a Magical Girl. (Every two Magical Girls which Vacation in your Empire will grant +1 to Yields.)
Magical Girl Defected to Another Empire!
After losing all faith in your Empire, {1_Name} has renounced her citizenship and defected to {2_Civilization}!
Foreign Magical Girl Defected to your Empire!

The {2_Adjective} Magical Girl, {1_Name} has renounced her allegiance to her former country and has sworn allegiance to you! Make sure to take good care of her so that she won't come to regret the decision!

{1_MGName} has returned from taking a break to send some letters home and to read their replies. It's not as effective as her actually visiting home, but it will help reduce the effects of Homesickness for a while.
Magical Girl Returned from Writing Home

{1_MGName} has completed her Sparring session and earned [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_XP} XP[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_YELLOW]Note[ENDCOLOR]: She may not Spar with any Magical Girls again for another [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]{3_Turns}[ENDCOLOR] Turns.
Magical Girl Completed Sparring Session
